file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Openapi
servers:
  - url: '/'
paths:
  /service/ip/region:
    get:
      summary: get ip region
      operationId: getIpRegion
      tags:
        - Apis
      parameters:
        - name: ip
          in: query
          description: optional ip address
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  country:
                    type: string
                  area:
                    type: string
                  state:
                    type: string
                  city:
                    type: string
                  isp:
                    type: string
                  region:
                    type: string
                  ip:
                    type: string
              example:
                region: '中国四川省成都市电信'
  /openapi/token:
    post:
      summary: jwt mock token
      operationId: openapiToken
      tags:
        - Apis
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  access_token:
                    type: string
                  token_type:
                    type: string
                  expires_in:
                    type: integer
                    format: int32
              example:
                access_token: 'Bearer eyJraWQiOiIxMDAiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJ1cm46Y29tOm5ldHdvcmtudDpvYXV0aDI6djEiLCJhdWQiOiJ1cm46Y29tLm5ldHdvcmtudCIsImV4cCI6MTg4MjUwNjM1NiwianRpIjoiQTlaUHVjM3RsS1BoWmM0RnpzTlJjQSIsImlhdCI6MTU2NzE0NjM1NiwibmJmIjoxNTY3MTQ2MjM2LCJ2ZXJzaW9uIjoiMS4wIiwidXNlcl9pZCI6ImFkbWluIn0.Jb89PTAOY7zDQBUpLS-5L9iDz28__fBUhXgmXqjXByiu6HG1sSemHHs-C0n-ZFUH4Tn3yfVbcHndSjNtVQ__gZMmpKi4PCg7NTiSo7TZZmVYI9uinQEdnDlFT2YA97AL6jBCGJW2Ol6q-odSajpCdoMfOh9KM2yXKQPqr95P5v4Du7L-MNL8dW7evfa0gBpGA2FF4Sr4txerS_SXJg3ED4_px_WbbkqZYpzo6_MupNK9nfJVG7ycP50r21-HMrSnBR7pUN1JvF8mxpfmcQi8j0W4TiYFZV2PKV2AGqsJ9d4IuPu--3YHNpevG3Pv78982o6qK22o_4h4Z8VFzr_NUQ'
                token_type: 'bearer'
                expires_in: 600
  /openapi/upload:
    post:
      summary: post a file to upload
      operationId: openapiUpload
      tags: 
        - Apis
      requestBody:
        description: file to upload
        required: true
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties: 
                file:
                  type: string
                  format: binary
      security:
        - api_key: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: upload success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  code:
                    type: integer
                    format: int32
                  url:
                    type: string
              example:
                code: 0
                url: 'http://localhost:8081/uploads/openapi/1167322814205558785.png'
  /openapi/service:
    post:
      summary: openapi to service
      operationId: openapiToService
      tags:
        - Apis
      parameters:
        - name: handler
          in: query
          required: true
          description: handler name
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: path
          in: query
          description: optional handler path
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        required: false
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
      security:
        - api_key: []
      responses:
        '200':
          description: service response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
  /openapi/pinyin:
    post:
      summary: openapi to pinyin
      operationId: openapiToPinyin
      tags:
        - Apis
      parameters:
        - name: text
          in: query
          description: chinese text
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      security:
        - api_key: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
components:
  securitySchemes:
    api_key:
      type: apiKey
      name: Authorization
      in: header
